content.description: In sentence 1 (reproduced below), which of the following versions of the underlined text best expresses the relationship between ideas in the sentence?
content.question: As an undergraduate, Wanda DÃ­az-Merced hoped to become an astronomer, for when she was gradually losing her eyesight, she had doubts about entering a field that relies heavily on visual data.

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
